name: sugarhouse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small building where sap (= liquid from inside a plant) from trees called sugar maples is made into maple syrup (= a thick, sweet, brown liquid): The land was full of maple trees, so we built the sugarhouse close to the forest. A vacuum system sucks air from the plastic tubes that carry the sap from the trees to the sugar house. I had only been to Quebec once, on a grade 8 trip that involved a visit to a sugar shack.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sugarhouse was a wooden building with three large rooms. Many sugar houses are unheated.I received an invitation to visit one of Quebec's most famous maple syrup production facilities, or sugar shacks.
